The word wisdom (חכם) is mentioned 222 times in the [[Hebrew Bible]]. It was regarded as one of the highest virtues among the Israelites along with kindness (חסד) and justice (צדק). Both the books of [[Book of Proverbs|Proverbs]] and [[Psalms]] urge readers to obtain and to increase in wisdom. Here are some of the roles that the Hebrew Bible ascribes to wisdom:
